short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get advanced information to maximize profit on Wealthsimple

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension empowers users to effortlessly manage their Wealthsimple portfolio by providing an intuitive interface directly within the browser. Track your investments in real-time, view insights, and receive personalized buy and sell price suggestions to optimize your investment decisions. With a focus on simplicity and actionable advice, this tool ensures users can make informed choices and stay on top of their portfolio's performance.

Updated 12/8/2024:
- Fix bugs
